name: Tunnel Adventure
description:
Tunnel Adventure is an exciting and addictive game that challenges players to guide a paper airplane through a perilous tunnel.

The objective of the game is simple: cover as much distance as possible without crashing into the walls of the tunnel.Players take on the role of the paper airplane pilot and must maneuver their craft up and down through the tunnel, using quick reflexes and expert timing to avoid the sharp edges of the tunnel walls.

Overall, Tunnel Adventure is a thrilling and engaging game that offers hours of entertainment for players looking for a fast-paced and challenging gaming experience.

Game Features :
- Daily bonuses
- More than 20 paper airplanes
- Collecting circles for points
